title: Block Printed Striped Boxer Shorts
description:
Craft: Sanganeri Hand Block Print
Primary Fabric: 100% Cotton - Azo-Free Dyed, Hand Block Printed in Sanganer (Rajasthan)
This is a lined garment
Pattern: Stripes
Color: White
Style: Short, Boxers
Length: Mid-Thigh Length
Mid Rise waist
Full Elasticated Waist
This garment has Inseam Pocket
Number of Pockets: 2
Garment Transparency: Opaque
Relaxed Fit
Elasticized Drawstring at Waist
Handcrafted Tassels at Waist
Wash delicately by hand, or in the most gentle machine cycle.
Iron on reverse. Line dry in the shade.
Do not dry clean, bleach, wring, tumble dry or iron on embellishments.
Natural colors tend to bleed. Wash them separately with less washing agent.
